original_text: And this is love, that we walk according to his commandments; this is the commandment, just as you have heard from the beginning, so that you should walk in it.
korean_text: 또 사랑은 이것이니 우리가 그 계명을 따라 행하는 것이요 계명은 이것이니 너희가 처음부터 들은 바와 같이 그 가운데서 행하라 하심이라

sentences.original_text: that we walk according to his commandments;
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 그의 계명에 따라 행하는 것입니다;

sentences.original_text: just as you have heard from the beginning,
so that you should walk in it.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그 안에서 행하게 하려는 것입니다.
